name: Smart Pupils
description: Smart Pupils is here to revolutionize the education sector in world by introducing interactive learning to K-12 students. SP in an interactive classroom tool thats redefining the traditional class room activities.  SP has developed the platform to enhance the learning process in class rooms and also facilitate school management make decisions efficiently, timely and effectively.   Smart Pupils is an online cloud based School & College management ERP that will take Schools and Colleges from old traditional methods of teachings to latest Social interactive methods.   Smart Pupils is a turnkey End-to-End solution that will help schools manage their students from admission to the issuance of leaving certificate. It is the only application that manages all the areas of school Management, May it be Academics, Finance, HR etc. Smart Pupils not only improves education of any schools but at the same time saves money, workforce and resources.
